scripts.frontend1: cd frontend && npm i && npm run dev -- --port 5173
scripts.frontend2: cd admin_frontend && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.frontend3: cd login-register && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.backend: cd backend && npm i && npm start
scripts.lms: concurrently "npm run frontend1" "npm run frontend2" "npm run frontend3" "npm run backend"
